title: Home Page
content: Welcome to my Digital Garden! This is a collection of highlights of anything interesting I come across and thoughts about my life, projects, etc. [!info] Use the Search Bar, the sidebar or the links below to navigate. Check out my recent posts: Useful Git Commands: (2:48 PM - March 05, 2025) My Toolbox: (1:12 PM - March 05, 2025)

title: My Toolbox

title: Useful Git Commands
content: Setup: git config --global user.name username git config --global user.email email Init Repo: git init git add . git remote add origin remote-url <link> git commit -m "any_message" git push --set-upstream origin master Commit & Push: git commit -m "any_message" git push Home
